Title: OpenSearch Knowledge Graph Engine
Description: Open-source graph database engine built on OpenSearch. Supports Cypher queries and real-time graph traversal with distributed indexing. Used by companies processing billions of nodes. Features include: multi-graph queries; advanced semantic capabilities; Tinkerpop integration; REST and gRPC APIs.

Title: Real-time Analytics Platform
Description: High-throughput analytics infrastructure processing 50M+ events/second. Built with Kafka and custom stream processing engines. Reduced API latency by 60% through intelligent caching and query batching. Deployed across 15 data centers globally.

Title: GraphQL Federation Gateway
Description: Federated GraphQL implementation serving 2B+ daily active users. Intelligent query planning and distributed caching layer. Open-sourced core components used by 500+ companies. Reduces backend load by 70%.

Title: ML Pipeline Automation Framework
Description: End-to-end ML pipeline framework using TensorFlow and Kubeflow. Automated testing achieving 98% code coverage. Handles 10TB+ daily data processing. Integrated with Google Cloud AI platform.

Title: Azure DevOps Enhancement Suite
Description: CI/CD automation tools for Azure DevOps serving 500K+ enterprise customers. Microservices architecture with .NET Core. Open-source contributions merged into core product. Database optimization reducing query time by 45%.

Title: iOS App Store SDK
Description: Framework and SDK development for App Store infrastructure. Search and discovery features used by millions of developers. Caching strategies reducing API calls by 70%. Performance optimization for low-latency responses.

Title: Netflix Personalization Engine
Description: Content recommendation ML features and A/B testing framework. Real-time personalization experiments affecting millions of users. Microservices using Spring Boot and Docker. Monitoring dashboards for streaming health.

Title: Creative Cloud Collaboration Tools
Description: Real-time collaboration features for Adobe Creative Cloud using React and Node.js. Document synchronization across devices. RESTful APIs for asset management serving millions of creative professionals.

Title: Network Monitoring Automation
Description: Python-based network monitoring and automation tools for Cisco enterprise solutions. Automated testing and deployment scripts. Web dashboards for real-time network analytics. Learned distributed systems and networking protocols.
